item.title: Seamlessly Migrating Cloud Drive Files to OneDrive Using mover.io Service
item.description: 《Here, After Us - Mayday》 Preface Recently, the school sent an email stating that they would be transitioning email services from Google to Microsoft, and the previously unlimited Google Drive storage would be discontinued, replaced by 5TB of OneDrive space. I had been using Google Drive’s file service to synchronize and backup files across my multiple devices, accumulating nearly 300GB of data. Due to the slow download speeds of Google Drive in mainland China requiring a proxy, I opted for the officially recommended mover.
